document_data.caption: A map showing the Frostfenn in Norland.
document_data.name: Frostfenn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Frostfenn''' was a large marshland located on the island of [[Norland]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Frostfenn was found in central and northern Norland, wedged between the [[North Jotunhammer Mountains]] to the west and open grassland to the east. It was a dominating feature of inner Norland, covering approximately {{SI|1000|sq mi|k}} of the island. [[Norfen Lake]] sat along the northeast edge of the Frostfenn.
